en.Intro paragraph:
I'm a Front-End TypeScript/JavaScript developer, with Back-End experience (NodeJS, Strapi CMS, Loopback 4), and I also do DevOps (Docker, CI/CD, Gitlab).
- I build responsive, SEO friendly universal websites with React + Strapi / Loopback 4, that can be easily converted into a Progressive Web App (PWA).
- I develop cross-platform desktop apps (Electron).
I like working with a team and prefer Git, however i can get used to any working environment so it shouldn't be a problem.

ar.Intro paragraph: أقوم بتحويل الأفكار إلى مواقع، تطبيقات هواتف أو برامج سطح المكتب
